docs.lead_paragraph: Clark Willy, a seaman on board the American Republics liner Uruguay, which is due tonight from her first voyage to Buenos Aires, distinguished himself in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, by jumping overboard and rescuing a stevedore who had fallen into the water.

headline.main: SEAMAN HONORED AS HERO; Sailor on American Ship Saved Stevedore in Brazil Harbor

docs.snippet: The motorship Pilsudski is due to sail today for Northern Europe. Her passengers include Dr. Karol Ripa, Polish Consul at Pittsburgh, and Mrs. Ripa; Miss Elizabeth Gorska, J. C. Berthelsen, J. C. Holm, F. W. Baldwin, Mr. and Mrs. Carl Mickelsen, Mr....
docs.lead_paragraph: The motorship Pilsudski is due to sail today for Northern Europe. Her passengers include Dr. Karol Ripa, Polish Consul at Pittsburgh, and Mrs. Ripa; Miss Elizabeth Gorska, J. C. Berthelsen, J. C. Holm, F. W. Baldwin, Mr. and Mrs. Carl Mickelsen, Mr. and Mrs. Olaf Degen, and Richard C. Christiansen.

docs.snippet: The liner Uruguay of the American Republics Line docked last night at the end of its maiden trip to South American ports in the government's "Good Neighbor" service. During the voyage, it was reported here that there had been two fires on board, but...
docs.lead_paragraph: The liner Uruguay of the American Republics Line docked last night at the end of its maiden trip to South American ports in the government's "Good Neighbor" service. During the voyage, it was reported here that there had been two fires on board, but Captain William B. Oakley, master, said the only fire on the ship started on Nov. 13, while the ship was at sea, sixtyfive miles from Montevideo.

headline.main: LINER URUGUAY BACK; HAD ONLY ONE FIRE; Seaman Who Resuced Stevedore Is Hero of Trip

docs.snippet: Three seamen, former members of the crew of the steamship Algic, who participated in a sit-down strike while the vessel was in port at Montevideo, Uruguay, on Sept. 10, 1937, pleaded guilty yesterday in Federal court, Brooklyn,

headline.main: 3 ALGIC SEAMEN TAKE PLEA OF GUILTY HERE; To Be Sentenced Tuesday in U. S. Court for Negligence

docs.snippet: Secretary of State Cordell Hull sees the world at a crossroads today, one road leading to peace and the other to war, according to a statement released to the Panama press on his arrival aboard the liner Santa Clara, en route to the Eighth...
docs.lead_paragraph: Secretary of State Cordell Hull sees the world at a crossroads today, one road leading to peace and the other to war, according to a statement released to the Panama press on his arrival aboard the liner Santa Clara, en route to the Eighth Pan-American Conference at Lima, Peru.

docs.snippet: Ten countries are sending their Foreign Ministers here to preside over their delegations to the Pan-American Conference here opening Dec. 9. They are Bolivia, Colombia, Costa Rica, Cuba, Ecuador, Guatemala, Nicaragua, Panama, Peru and the United...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ten countries are sending their Foreign Ministers here to preside over their delegations to the Pan-American Conference here opening Dec. 9. They are Bolivia, Colombia, Costa Rica, Cuba, Ecuador, Guatemala, Nicaragua, Panama, Peru and the United States.

headline.main: LIMA CONFEREES FORESEE HARMONY; Chaco Peace and Truce of Ecuador and Peru Augur Well for Deliberations FOREIGN MINISTERS MEET Ten to Be Delegates and One a Visitor--May Discuss Democracies' Problems Get-Together Significant Chaco Peace Helpful
